This blog is created using a package called `distill`. It is an R-Markdown based platform specifically designed for science communication. The [package website](https://rstudio.github.io/distill/) is a useful source of information about how to set up and maintain a distill site.  You can see examples of other sites that have been created [using distill here](https://pkgs.rstudio.com/distill/articles/examples.html).
